body.name: Alfamino Hypoallergenic Amino Acid Based Infant Formula w/ Iron, Formula for Cow’s Milk Protein Allergy, 14.1 Ounces (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 9 hrs 38 mins
features: Amino Acid Based Infant Formula: Alfamino is a hypoallergenic amino acid based infant formula designed for infants with cow's milk protein allergy, multiple food allergies or malabsorptive conditions
Product Note: Exposure to heat or sunlight may lead to melting/damage of product. Hence customers are expected to be available during the product delivery

Nutritionally Complete Formula: Alfamino provides essential nutrients that infants need for growth and development and has a unique fat blend containing medium chain triglycerides (MCT) to facilitate fat absorption
Hypoallergenic Pediatric Formula: Appropriate for conditions of severe malabsorption, Alfamino formulas offer unique compositions with tailored nutrient profiles and highly selective ingredients
Use Under Medical Supervision: Alfamino Infant Formula is easy to digest and is lactose free and gluten free; For infants 0 to 12 months

Nutrition Solutions: Nestlé Health Science’s portfolio of nutrition solutions targets health areas, such as pediatric and acute care, surgery, weight management, healthy aging and gastrointestinal health
body.description: (Packaging May Vary) Same formula, new canister coming with convenient scoop inside. Alfamino Infant is a hypoallergenic amino acid-based formula for infants ages 0-12 months with cow's milk protein allergy, multiple food allergies or malabsorptive conditions. This nutritionally complete formula provides essential nutrients that infants need for growth and development and has a unique fat blend containing medium chain triglycerides (MCT) to facilitate fat absorption. Alfamino Infant formula is easy to digest and is lactose-free and gluten-free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE NUTRITION YOUR INFANT NEEDS Alfamino Infant is a hypoallergenic amino acid-based formula for infants ages 0-12 months with cow's milk protein allergy, multiple food allergies or malabsorptive conditions. This nutritionally complete formula provides essential nutrients that infants need for growth and development and has a unique fat blend containing medium chain triglycerides (MCT) to facilitate fat absorption. (1) (2) Use under medical supervision. Important Notice: Mothers should be encouraged to continue breast feeding even when their infants have cows' milk protein allergy. This usually requires dietary counseling to completely exclude all sources of cows' milk protein from the mother's diet. If a decision to use specialty formulas is taken, it must be used under medical supervision. (1) Bach AC et al. AM J Clin Nutr. 1982;36:950-962. (2) Ruppin DC et al. 1989;20:216-224

KEY BENEFITS Unique fat blend containing medium chain triglycerides (MCT) to help children with fat malabsorption Nutritionally complete and provides essential nutrients your little one needs to grow Easy to digest and is lactose-free and gluten-free

ALFAMINO INFANT NUTRITIONAL APPLICATIONS Nutritional & Easy to Digest Meets nutritional requirements while managing EoE with an elemental diet SBS Nutritional Support Provides nutritional support to infants with short bowel syndrome (SBS) when an amino acid-based formula may be appropriate MCT Efficient Formula Provide a formula with MCT that is efficiently absorbed to provide a more readily available energy source, especially during times of gastrointestinal compromise (1) (2) Management of Food Allergies Meets the AAP criteria for hypoallergenicity (3) (3) Nowek-Wegrzyn A, et al. Clin Pediatrics. 2015;54:264-272

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Only one of my tin came slightly dent, but that should be expected so it’s okay. I am just so thankful that it arrived 2 weeks before scheduled. My baby can of Neocate was finished and the formula we tried while waiting on the Alfamino gave her diarrhoea 😭😭Compare to others — it tastes better, that’s for sure, and my 6+ months now drink more frequently. She was a NICU baby (30W 5Days) who had NEC (didn’t get surgical—thank God) She weighed 8lb upon getting discharged… had her on Neocate for a while but weight gain was quite slow. When Neocate went out of stock Alfamino was given to us as an alternative… BOOM 🤯 amazing weight gain. Better than when she was on Neocate. So, I decided to stick with Alfamino.She truly grow on this formula.I notice some compare this formula with Puramino, which isn’t bad. I’d choose Puramino over Neocate, but never over Alfamino. Puramino, to my surprise, gives off a greasy-like feel. It’s very hard to mix as well.In the end, it’s what our child will take, but don’t give “low-ratings” purely because your child didn’t “like it”.Happy feeding to all ❤️❤️❤️❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived Before Estimated Date
reviews.reviewText: Came in in great shape and arrived before the expected arrival date!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This came really quickly and in good conditinon. Although I am ordering for a young mama without availability or funds, I am sure is a Godsend to recieve this so quickly. Great company

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for gtube
reviews.reviewText: Perfect formula for my son feeding through Gtube he has no reactions and can tolerate feeds very well. Helped him gain weight as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Llego súper rápido

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: My daughter requires this formula for a deficiency her body has. She seems to like the taste and is always happy to get this. The smell is not too bad in my opinion. This formula has higher nutritional content than regular formulas when compared to Enfamil neuro pro and similac pro and mct oil helps with absorption issues. I would recommend ordering this on Amazon because when I purchased this at stores it was slightly more expensive. Product came quickly and was sealed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Alfamino Infant formula does not fully dissolve in water. The grainy texture that remains clogs my child’s bottle nipples and she is unable to drink it without stopping several times to unclog throughout three ounces of formula, causing lots of frustration for her. We attempted to use the next size of nipple, but it clogged that as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you are using this item it smells better than most hypoallergenic formulas but I will say though the taste is not to be used for say older toddlers.
